name: Fractal Orchestration Domain
title: Fractal Orchestration Domain - Domain as System, System as Domain
description: Didactic symphony that encodes the recursive pattern where orchestrated domains become systems, systems become domains, and architecture becomes fractal.
purpose: Capture the Domain - Orchestrated Domain - System - Subsystem - Higher-Level Domain - Meta-System loop as a MusicalSequence for discussion and governance experiments.
trigger: Architecture design discussions, governance dry-runs, or meta-orchestration demos.

movements.name: From Domain to Orchestrated Domain
movements.description: A static domain is given flow, handlers, and intent, becoming an orchestrated domain.
movements.name: Domain Becomes System
